## Discussion

When the value of the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetReaderOutput/supportsRandomAccess] property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the asset reader doesn’t advance to an [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetReader/Status-swift.enum/completed] state until you call this method.

After you call this method, you can’t make further calls to the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetReaderOutput/reset(forReadingTimeRanges:)] method.

When the destination of the output’s media data is an [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetWriterInput] that you configure for multi-pass encoding, an appropriate time to call this method is after the asset writer input indicates that it doesn’t require performing additional passes.

# markConfigurationAsFinal()

**Instance Method**

Tells the output that it’s finished reconfiguring time ranges, and allows the asset reader to advance to a completed state.

## Declaration

```swift
func markConfigurationAsFinal()
```

## Discussion

When the value of the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetReaderOutput/supportsRandomAccess] property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the asset reader doesn’t advance to an [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetReader/Status-swift.enum/completed] state until you call this method.

After you call this method, you can’t make further calls to the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetReaderOutput/reset(forReadingTimeRanges:)] method.

When the destination of the output’s media data is an [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetWriterInput] that you configure for multi-pass encoding, an appropriate time to call this method is after the asset writer input indicates that it doesn’t require performing additional passes.

## Configuring reading

- **alwaysCopiesSampleData**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the output vends copied sample data.
- **supportsRandomAccess**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the output supports reconfiguring the time ranges it reads.
- **reset(forReadingTimeRanges:)**: Restarts reading with a new set of time ranges.
